abstract.label: Abstract
abstract.value: Steamfitters' Local 638 is a subsidiary of the United Association of Journeymen and Apprentices of the Plumbing and Pipe Fitting Industry of the United States and Canada that is headquartered in Long Island City, New York. This collection consists of photographic negatives and prints of classes and staff members at the Steamfitters' Local 638 Industry Training Center in Long Island City. Photographs were taken by Werner Ulrich, the center's Director of Education.

p.value: Identification of item, date; Steamfitters' Local 638 (United Association of Journeymen and Apprentices of the Plumbing and Pipe Fitting Industry, Local 0638) Photographs; PHOTOS 084; box number; folder number; Tamiment Library/Robert F. Wagner Labor Archives, New York University.
Donated by Janet Greene in 1998. The accession number associated with this gift is NPA.1998.021 and NPA.2007.035.

Steamfitters' Local 638 is a subsidiary of the United Association of Journeymen and Apprentices of the Plumbing and Pipe Fitting Industry of the United States and Canada that is headquartered in Long Island City, New York.

This collection consists of photographic negatives and prints of classes and staff members at the Steamfitters' Local 638 Industry Training Center in Long Island City. Photographs were taken by Werner Ulrich, the center's Director of Education.
